name: Transjugular Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt (TIPS) Thrombosis with Hepatic Encephalopathy
chief_complaint: I feel confused and my stomach is swollen and painful
prognosis: Guarded. Requires lifelong monitoring for shunt patency and recurrent encephalopathy. 30% 1-year mortality if untreated.
description: Acute thrombosis of a previously placed TIPS shunt leading to portal hypertension recurrence, hepatic encephalopathy from shunted toxins, and rapid ascites formation. Requires urgent interventional radiology management to restore shunt patency.
multiple_choice: Transjugular Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt (TIPS) Thrombosis with Hepatic Encephalopathy
